questions.question:
Fill in the blank:
In passive voice, we often use the word "___" before mentioning who did the action. (by / to)
options: a) by
b) to
questions.explanation: "By" is commonly used to introduce the doer in passive voice.

questions.question: Which sentence is in active voice?
options: a) The game was won by our team
b) Our team won the game
c) The game is being won
d) Winning was done by our team
questions.explanation: The subject (our team) is directly performing the action (won).

questions.question: The passive form of "Lisa paints beautiful pictures" is:
options: a) Beautiful pictures painted by Lisa
b) Beautiful pictures are painted by Lisa
c) Lisa is painting beautiful pictures
d) Painting is done by Lisa
questions.explanation: This correctly changes the active voice to passive, keeping the present tense.

questions.question: In passive voice, the subject of the active sentence becomes the:
options: a) Verb
b) Object
c) Adjective
d) Adverb
questions.explanation: The subject in the active voice becomes the object in the passive voice.

questions.question:
Fill in the blank:
"The letter _____ written by John." (Use the correct form of "to be")
options: a) are
b) was
questions.explanation: "Was" is the correct past tense form of "to be" for this passive sentence.

questions.question: Which sentence is in passive voice?
options: a) The cat chased the mouse
b) The mouse ran away
c) The mouse was chased by the cat
d) The cat and mouse played
questions.explanation: This sentence puts the object (mouse) first and uses "was chased."

questions.question: The active voice of "The pizza was delivered by the driver" is:
options: a) The driver delivered the pizza
b) The driver delivers the pizza
c) The pizza is delivering
d) The driver is delivering the pizza
questions.explanation: This puts the doer (driver) first and uses the simple past tense.

questions.question: In the sentence "The book is read by students," what is the verb phrase?
options: a) The book
b) Read by
c) By students
d) Is read
questions.explanation: "Is read" is the passive verb phrase in this sentence.

questions.question:
Fill in the blank:
"Mistakes _____ made by everyone." (Use the correct form of "to be")
options: a) is
b) are
c) was
questions.explanation: "Are" is the correct present tense form of "to be" for this passive sentence.

questions.question: Which sentence uses active voice?
options: a) The cake was eaten by the children
b) Eating was done by the children
c) The cake is being eaten
d) The children ate the cake
questions.explanation: The subject (children) is directly performing the action (ate).

questions.question: The passive form of "They will announce the winner tomorrow" is:
options: a) The winner will announce tomorrow
b) The winner will be announced tomorrow
c) They are announcing the winner tomorrow
d) The winner is announced tomorrow
questions.explanation: This correctly changes the active voice to passive, keeping the future tense.

questions.question: In active voice, who or what comes first in the sentence?
options: a) The object
b) The verb
c) The subject
d) The adverb
questions.explanation: In active voice, the subject (doer of the action) typically comes first.

questions.question:
Fill in the blank:
"The house _____ painted by the workers." (Use the correct form of "to be") (was / were)
options: a) was
b) were
questions.explanation: "Was" is the correct past tense form of "to be" for this passive sentence.

questions.question: Which sentence is in passive voice?
options: a) The dog barks loudly
b) The cat climbs the tree
c) The tree is being climbed by the cat
d) The birds sing sweetly
questions.explanation: This sentence puts the object (tree) first and uses "is being climbed."

questions.question: In passive voice, what happens to the main verb?
options: a) It stays the same
b) It changes to past tense
c) It becomes a noun
d) It changes to past participle
questions.explanation: In passive voice, the main verb changes to its past participle form.

questions.question: Which sentence uses passive voice?
options: a) Tom writes a letter
b) A letter is written by Tom
c) The pen writes smoothly
d) Writing is Tom's hobby
questions.explanation: This sentence puts the object (letter) first and uses "is written."

questions.question: The passive form of "The wind blows the leaves" is:
options: a) The leaves blow in the wind
b) The leaves are blown by the wind
c) The wind is blowing the leaves
d) Blowing is done to the leaves
questions.explanation: This correctly changes the active voice to passive, keeping the present tense.

questions.question: In the sentence "The game was played by the team," what is the subject?
options: a) The game
b) Was
c) Played
d) The team
questions.explanation: In passive voice, the receiver of the action (game) becomes the subject.

questions.question:
Fill in the blank:
"The story _____ told by grandpa every night." (Use the correct form of "to be") (is / are / were)
options: a) is
b) are
c) were
questions.explanation: "Is" is the correct present tense form of "to be" for this passive sentence.

questions.question: Which sentence is in active voice?
options: a) The car was washed by dad
b) The car is being washed
c) Dad washed the car
d) Washing was done to the car
questions.explanation: The subject (Dad) is directly performing the action (washed).

questions.question:
Fill in the blank:
"The flowers _____ watered by the gardener." (Use the correct form of "to be") (was / were)
options: a) was
b) were
questions.explanation: "Were" is the correct past tense form of "to be" for this passive sentence.

questions.question: Which sentence uses passive voice?
options: a) The boy kicks the ball
b) The ball flies through the air
c) The ball is kicked by the boy
d) Kicking is fun for the boy
questions.explanation: This sentence puts the object (ball) first and uses "is kicked."

questions.question: The active voice of "The room was cleaned by the maid" is:
options: a) The maid cleans the room
b) The maid cleaned the room
c) The room is clean
d) The maid is cleaning the room
questions.explanation: This puts the doer (maid) first and uses the simple past tense.

questions.question: In the sentence "The book was written by a famous author," what is the verb phrase?
options: a) The book
b) Was written
c) By a famous author
d) Famous author
questions.explanation: "Was written" is the passive verb phrase in this sentence.

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is in active voice?
options: a) The ancient treasure was discovered by the archaeologists.
b) A beautiful melody is being played by the violinist.
c) The curious children examine the colourful butterfly.
d) The delicious meal was enjoyed by everyone at the party.
questions.explanation: This sentence is in active voice because the subject (the curious children) is directly performing the action (examine).
